briefdescription.para: Compile time constant representing what kind of schema this class is.
Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI on UsdPrim prim .

detaileddescription.para: Equivalent to PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI::Get(prim.GetStage(), prim.GetPath()) for a valid prim, but will not immediately throw an error for an invalid prim

briefdescription.para: Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI on the prim held by schemaObj .

detaileddescription.para: Should be preferred over PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI(schemaObj.GetPrim()), as it preserves SchemaBase state.

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Particle friction coefficient.

detaileddescription.para: The maximal friction force tangential to the surface is equal to the normal force times the particle friction. Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetParticleFrictionAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Particle damping.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetParticleDampingAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Viscosity for fluid particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetViscosityAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Vorticity confinement for fluid particles.

detaileddescription.para: Helps prevent energy loss due to numerical solver by adding vortex-like accelerations to the particles. Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetVorticityConfinementAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Surface tension for fluid particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: 1 / (distance * distance * distance)

briefdescription.para: See GetSurfaceTensionAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Cohesion for fluid particles.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetCohesionAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Gravitational acceleration scaling factor.

detaileddescription.para: Can be used to approximate lighter-than-air inflatables, for example (-1.0 would invert gravity). Range: (-inf, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetGravityScaleAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Lift coefficient for cloth and inflatable particle objects.

detaileddescription.para: Basic aerodynamic lift model coefficient. Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetLiftAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Drag coefficient for cloth and inflatable particle objects.

detaileddescription.para: Basic aerodynamic drag model coefficient. Range: [0, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetDragAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Density used to compute particle object mass.

detaileddescription.para: If set to 0.0, the simulation determines a default density. A density or mass set with a PhysicsMassAPI on a particle object overrides the material density. Range: [0, inf) Units: mass / distance / distance / distance

briefdescription.para: See GetDensityAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: This coefficient scales the CFL term used to limit relative motion between fluid particles.

detaileddescription.para: A very large value disables the limit. Range: [1, inf) Units: dimensionless

briefdescription.para: See GetCflCoefficientAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Return a vector of names of all pre-declared attributes for this schema class and all its ancestor classes.

detaileddescription.para: Does not include attributes that may be authored by custom/extended methods of the schemas involved.

briefdescription.para: Return a PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI holding the prim adhering to this schema at path on stage.

detaileddescription.para: If no prim exists at path on stage, or if the prim at that path does not adhere to this schema, return an invalid schema object. This is shorthand for the following:

briefdescription.para: Applies this single-apply API schema to the given prim.

detaileddescription.para: This information is stored by adding "PhysxPBDMaterialAPI" to the token-valued, listOp metadata apiSchemas on the prim.

simplesect.para: A valid PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI object is returned upon success. An invalid (or empty) PhysxSchemaPhysxPBDMaterialAPI object is returned upon failure. See UsdPrim::ApplyAPI() for conditions resulting in failure.

briefdescription.para: Returns the type of schema this class belongs to.
Applied to a USD Material.

detaileddescription.para: PhysX position-based-dynamics (PBD) material for particles used to simulate fluids, cloth and inflatables. Currently, only a single material per particle system is supported which applies to all objects that are associated with the system.
